XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <Route Url="/test" Method="GET" Call="Test"/>
<Route Url="/region/:id" Method="GET" Call="GetRegion"/> <Route Url="/regions" Method="GET" Call="GetRegions"/> <Route Url="/region/save" Method="POST" Call="SaveRegion"/> <Route Url="/region/addreg" Method="POST" Call="AddRegion" />
<Route Url="company/:id" Method="GET" Call="GetCompany" /> <!-- <Route Url="/region/setpoints/:lan&:lag" Method="POST" Call="SetPoints"/> -->
<!--<Route Url="/region" Method="GET" Call="Fishnet.Json:GetRegions"/> <Route Url="/json/region:id" Method="GET" Call="Fishnet.Json:GetRegionById"/> <Route Url="/json/region:id" Method="POST" Call="Fishnet.Json:SaveRegion"/> <Route Url="json/region" Mehtod="DELETE" Call="fishnet.Json:DeleteRegion"/> --> </Routes>
